Q: How to make Hershey's Gold Vanilla Ice Cream at home.

(a) In a large bowl combine 4 cups half and half (Or light cream)1 1/2 cups sugar, and 1 tablespoon vanilla.  Stir until sugar dissolves.  Stir in 2 cups whipping cream.
